titles.title: Providing for further consideration of the bill (H.R. 2401) to authorize appropriations for fiscal year 1994 for military activities of the Department of Defense, to prescribe military personnel strengths for fiscal year 1994, and for other purposes.

action.text: Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2401. Specified amendments are in order. Amendments shall be in order as specified in the report accompanying H. Res. 248 (Rept. 103-236).
The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 103-236, by Mr. Frost.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 84.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate.
The unfinished business pending before the House is a motion on ordering the previous question on the resolution.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 169 (Roll no. 424).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 234 - 169 (Roll no. 425).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 9/9/1993--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the further consideration of H.R. 2401 (authorizing FY 1994 appropriations for the Department of Defense).
